Articles.Content: Just thought I would pop in and say hi, I hit 100h last weekend I thought it was time to register after lurking around for a year or so. I started really delving into modding for customizing my install with a custom techtree and some bits and pieces from mods here and there, still being on a low end computer I don't want to many new parts, but want the functions and exclusive parts. Must say modulemanagare is a work of art.
Welcome to the forum, Swedish person.

Hi xiziz, may you have many posts and lots of rep (but only after the initiation ceremony mwahahaha!)

Try Active Texture management (link here!) for saving RAM!
